meanings.meaning: stuff[shove, stick] it … up one's[your] jumper

vlive.korean: 네 멋대로만 해~ 막 이렇게 하는... said "Have it your way." 듣기 View video OH MY GIRL : 이 브이앱을 보는건 destiny 야~~~
[(맨날 지) 멋대로만 해...] [(Always) Does what she wants...] View video MAMAMOO : [MMMTV5] EP3 무무전: 이리 오너라~! 2부
또 자기 멋대로... All he does what he wants to do. 듣기 View video WHYNOT TV : [다르게 적히는 연애] EP05. 나를 걱정해 준다는 건...
vlive.english: All he does what he wants to do.

vlive.korean: 내가 그냥 내 멋대로 정했어. I just decided it on my own. 듣기 View video V Special : <진리상점> 랜선 개업식 in 설리 대표님방 LIVE
vlive.english: I just decided it on my own.

vlive.korean: 너의 멋대로 해도 되는데. You can do whatever you want to do... 듣기 View video Apink : 배터리없어서꺼졌어
vlive.english: You can do whatever you want to do...

examples.korean: He took the liberty of reading my files while I was away. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 내가 없을 때 자기 멋대로 내 파일을 읽었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He took the liberty of reading my files while I was away. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Let them do their worst—we’ll fight them every inch of the way. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들이 최대한 멋대로 굴도록 내버려 둬. 우리가 차근차근 갚아 줄테니까. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Let them do their worst—we’ll fight them every inch of the way. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The movie takes considerable liberties with the novel that it is based on. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 영화는 기반이 된[원작] 소설을 자기들 멋대로 상당히 많이 바꾸고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The movie takes considerable liberties with the novel that it is based on. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It was an arbitrary decision to choose red instead of blue. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 파란색 대신 빨간색을 고른 것은 그녀 멋대로의 결정이었다. 절대어휘 5100
examples.english: It was an arbitrary decision to choose red instead of blue. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I’ve got a friend request on Facebook from a stranger who is friend farming. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 페이스북에서 친구 수를 늘리기 위해 모르는 사람을 멋대로 추가하는 사람에게서 친구 추가 요청을 받았다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: I’ve got a friend request on Facebook from a stranger who is friend farming. Add to Wordbook
